Title: Declares agreements exempting employers from liability for negligence related to the COVID-19 pandemic void and unenforceable
Summary: Declares agreements exempting employers from liability for negligence related to the COVID-19 pandemic void and unenforceable.
LawCode: Add ยง5-322.4, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to declaring agreements exempting employers from liability for negligence related to the COVID-19 pandemic void and unenforceable
